did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Sex education, family life education, and child development pamphlets, broadsides, comics, and brochures designed for teenagers, pre-teens, and parents; issued by the American Social Hygiene Association, the American Social Health Association, F. E. Compton & Co., the Minnesota Dept. of Health, and others. Topics also include prostitution, sexually transmitted diseases, heterosexual dating, and marriage.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Sex education, family life education, and child development pamphlets, broadsides, comics, and brochures designed for teenagers, pre-teens, and parents; issued by the American Social Hygiene Association, the American Social Health Association, F. E. Compton & Co., the Minnesota Dept. of Health, and others. Topics also include prostitution, sexually transmitted diseases, heterosexual dating, and marriage.

prefercite.p: Sex instruction booklets, #7638. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
